# 1.importing data
setwd("~/Desktop/qmssviz/hw2")
dd1 <- read.csv("lgas.csv")
dd2 <- read.csv("sample_health_facilities.csv")
summary(dd1$zone)
summary(dd2$zone)

# 2.Select all facilities located in the Southern zones of Nigeria
dd3 <- subset(dd2, zone %in% c("South-South", "Southeast", "Southwest"))
dd3

# 3.Incorporate the pop2006 column
dd4 <- subset(dd1, select = c(lga_id, pop_2006))
dd5 <- merge(dd3, dd4, by = "lga_id")
dd5


# 4.Calculate the total number of full time nurses and doctors for all health facilities in each state
total_nurse <- tapply(dd5$num_nurses_fulltime, dd5$state, sum)
total_nurse
total_doc <- tapply(dd5$num_doctors_fulltime,dd5$state, sum)
total_doc

# 5.Sort the resulting dataset by state population, in descending order.
dd5 <- dd5 [ order(-dd5$pop_2006), ]
dd5
